body_html: I believe sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits spits out nans now for invalid indices, and this is the best that can be feasibly done given the structure of the code (especially on GPU). Unfortunately Eigen is designed to make returning errors nearly impossible.
body_text: I believe sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits spits out nans now for invalid indices, and this is the best that can be feasibly done given the structure of the code (especially on GPU).  Unfortunately Eigen is designed to make returning errors nearly impossible.
body: I believe `sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits` spits out nans now for invalid indices, and this is the best that can be feasibly done given the structure of the code (especially on GPU).  Unfortunately Eigen is designed to make returning errors nearly impossible.
